question: What is the subject of the best-known works of writers Theodor Mommsen and Edward Gibbon?
api_result: The best-known works of Theodor Mommsen and Edward Gibbon are both centered on the subject of history, specifically Roman history. Theodor Mommsen is renowned for his work "The History of Rome" (Römische Geschichte), which covers the history of Rome up to the end of the Roman Republic and the rule of Julius Caesar. Edward Gibbon is best known for "The History of the Decline and Fall of the Roman Empire," which details the history and reasons for the decline of the Roman Empire from the height of its power to the fall of Byzantium.
